notesStmt.note: An English translation of the "De augmentis scientiarum" which is an enlargement, translated into Latin, of Bacon's "The advancement of learning", 1605.
Running title reads: Of the aduancement of learning.
This edition has a cancel letterpress title page and colophon is dated 1640. A variant issue (STC 1167.3) has colophon dated 1640. Another variant issue has colophon dated M.DC.XXXIX (STC 1167).
At least R2,3, X1.4, Y1-4, and 2A1,4 are in at least two settings, indiscriminately mixed.
